name: Bitflight
description:
Bitflight is my intake assignment for BUAS. It is an arcade-style shooter that is customizable with lua scripts. It is my first serious project in my journey as a game developer. 

Credits go to:

- Ana Dirica for art  https://instagram.com/ana_creates_art?igshid=1e5dmvuourhhr

- Valerix for music and sfx https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8mGNFGRp7b3z0NaGYteFeA

- Florin Istudor for level design

- Dragos Popescu (me) for programming

-The book SFML Game Development by Artur Moreira, Henrik Vogelius Hansson, Jan Haller for providing a base for the game engine. 

This is a pretty short game that was mostly made as a programming challenge (hence the moddable aspect). I'm open to any kind of discussion regarding programming :)

Controls

- WASD for movement

- QE for switching ammo type

- Space for firing

- Esc for pausing

- All controls are configurable in the options menu
